rewards.description:
Celebrate Overwatch 2's biggest season yet with the launch of Season 15 by receiving drops watching any of your fav Overwatch creators. 

Watch a total of 12 hours to get the full Rainy Day Mei bundle and gift 2 subs to any OW streamer to receive Rainy Day Tracer skin!

Watch 2 hours to get the OWCS Guardian Lantern Spray, 4 hours to get the OWCS Champion's Guardian Spray, 6 hours to get the OWCS Champion's Guardian Icon, 7 hours to get the OWCS Road to Hangzhou Name Card, and 8 hours to get the Overwatch Championship Series Home Lifeweaver Skin.

Join in for exclusive prizes and keep an eye on our for how we evolve this event in the future. If you need assistance please join our discord. Discord.gg/pixelbypixelstudios

rewards.description: Celebrate the launch of War Robots: Frontiers on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox by giving some loot to your community! All they need to do is watch your Drop-enabled streams from March 4-10, rack up enough viewing time, and claim their free loot from their Twitch Drops Inventory. All you need to do is enable Twitch Drops on your channel and stream War Robots: Frontiers!
rewards.name: Launch Celebration

rewards.description:
Celebrate the launch of War Robots: Frontiers on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox! We are looking to support all War Robots: Frontiers creators so we've made this campaign open to all streamers. Viewers can earn a reward by purchasing or gifting two (2) subscriptions on your channel.

If you want to participate in more exclusive War Robots: Frontiers Twitch Drops campaigns, join the MY.GAMES Content Creator Program at https://creators.my.games
rewards.name: Support a Streamer

rewards.description: Celebrate the launch of War Robots: Frontiers on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox! This campaign is only open to select creators so please ensure you have Twitch Drops enabled on your stream while streaming War Robots: Frontiers.

rewards.description: Viewers will receive 50 Wandering Market Coins for each two hours spent viewing participating streams from March 4, 2025 until March 11, 2025 at 12:00 UTC. Rewards must be claimed while the Twitch Campaign is running in order to be received in-game.

rewards.description: The Kilima Couture update is all about self-expression, and we're celebrating with a Twitch Drops campaign focused on the debut of Palia's highly-expressive Stickers! Pop into your favorite content creator's Palia stream and earn up to six rewards, including 1x Series 1 Sticker Pack, 2x Series 1 Sticker Packs, and 3x Series 1 Sticker Packs!

rewards.description: Creators take the wheel this season. Four different Creator Commissioners will step into the spotlight for two weeks each, bringing challenges to conquer, new and returning fan favorite modes, and fresh rewards. rewards.description:
Celebrate the launch of Spectre Divide's first season, and Console launch, with these new Season 1: Flashpoint themed rewards! 

Season 1 of Spectre Divide has so much new content that it's essentially a brand new game- with New Movement, New Map, New Sponsor, New Battle Pass, New Lore, New Buy Menu, and more! Stream during the first two weeks of launch to have access to FIVE incredible drops. We're giving away a ton of great rewards for this campaign- don't miss out!
rewards.name: New Season: Flashpoint

rewards.description: Announcing Kakele Online's Epic Twitch Drops!  Embark on a unique journey in Kakele's realm. Dive into mystical lands, conquer quests, and enjoy our exciting Twitch Drops for enhanced gaming. Unlock rewards, including teleports, herbs, potions, and materials.   Timed Rewards: Enjoy cities Teleports, Ultra potions, Gold Refiner Kits and collect Dog Cards and Trophies.   Prosperity Path: Gain Copper, Tin, Silver, Iron, Gold, Life Herbs, Mana Herbs for success. Accumulate Reputation Coins.   Grand Finale: End with an exclusive Twitch Drop and Bacon Extravaganza surprise! Link accounts, watch streams, and claim rewards for an unforgettable RPG experience.   How to Join:  Link Accounts: Connect your account and Twitch in the game app. Watch Streams: Tune in during to your favorite Kakele streamer. Claim Rewards: Receive Twitch Drop notifications claim in the game app.  Influencers: To enable drops on your stream, email us!  Don't miss the chance to enrich your journey with Twitch Drops!
rewards.name: Kakele Online March
